GateDocument.TextWithNodes:
Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology invites applications for a research position in the area of MOCVD.
Responsibilities: The candidate should possess: at least 3 years MOCVD experience in GaAs based III-V compound semiconductor (experience in III-V growth on a Si or Se substrate is highly prepared) DXRD and PL experience III-V tandem cell device experience. MS or PhD in Material science or Physics or Electrical Engineering Contact Point: Please send CV and the publications list to Maxim Medvedev, SAIT Moscow Office, e-mail: m.medvedev@samsung.com
